description: Try our easy to follow Beetroot And Chickpea Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Beetroot,Peanut free
name: Beetroot And Chickpea Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup sultanas (alternatively use currants or cranberries)

recipeInstructions.text: Remove beetroot from the pack and drain. Cut into approximately 2cm pieces.
Cut onion in half and finely slice.
Combine beetroot, onion, sultanas, chickpeas (drained and rinsed) and toss all gently together.
Dressing: Place olive oil, balsamic vinegar & honey in a shaker and mix until emulsified.
Pour dressing over the mixed salad, add mint and parsley, gently toss together.
Finish with generous grind of black pepper and salt to taste.
